headerText: A front-end web developer. Created professional landing pages and websites for serveral companies, mainly focused on React, styled components and Jest/Jasmine. Love to write when having free time.
aboutText: I am a web developer focused on front-end technologies.
aboutDesc: Hello, I am Yuki! A front-end web developer emphasised UI/UX. Good at building user interfaces and work with various designers. Equipped with automated unit test and end-to-end test skills.
aboutDesc1: Love writing and learning new languages. Native in Cantonese, fluent in Japanese and English. Feel free to drop me a line!

projects.name: Ryugaku Fair
projects.desc: This page is created for EF Japan for promoting their education fairs and generating leads. Using Gatsby to programmatically generate pages for office/testimonials and office details.
projects.techDesc: The main technologies are Gatsby/React, SASS/CSS.

projects.name: Uniquiz - a quiz template
projects.desc: This is a quiz template created for EF Asia. Users can create different types of quizzes, like adding/removing point-based, category-based questions/answers by editing in Sitecore. Customers can change to different by using different paths, like moms-quiz, uniquiz etc.
projects.techDesc: The main technologies are React and React hook/router, SASS/CSS. Using react-testing-library for unit testing.

projects.name: Deres - Find your favourite recipes here!
projects.desc: Side project. This application is powered by Angular and Firestore. User can create or view public recipes. After login, they can create private recipes and manage their recipes in the dashboard. Moreover, they can like others' recipes. Only the author can edit their recipes and view private recipes.
projects.techDesc: The main technologies are Angular, Firestore, Jasmine.

projects.name: EF International Internship & Volunteer Programs
projects.desc: This is a landing page developed for EF Hong Kong, for introducing an internship programme to students and stakeholders like teachers and universities. Get data from backend API, with a different design for destinations in mobile and desktop version.
projects.techDesc: The main technologies are HTML, CSS, Javascript

projects.name: We Love Languages
projects.desc: This is a campaign page developed for EF Asia, for boosting awareness and sales of EF Asia offices, included EF Japan, Hong Kong, Indonesia, South Korea, Thailand, Vietnam. User needs to play and match six pairs of card and the end, they can get discounts on EF's courses.
projects.techDesc: The main technologies are React, SASS/CSS and webpack.

projects.name: Accent Quiz
projects.desc: This is a campaign page developed for EF China, for boosting leads and awareness of EF China. Through this quiz, the user can hear and answer questions of different accents. In the end, they can know their scores.
projects.techDesc: The main technologies are React, SASS/CSS, with WeChat SDK for customizing share content.

projects.name: EF Hot Deals
projects.desc: This is a promotion page developed for EF Asia, for boosting sales of EF Asia offices, included EF Japan, Hong Kong, Indonesia, South Korea, Thailand, Vietnam. Staff can switch to a different theme, e.g. Christmas to show different design.
projects.techDesc: The main technologies are HTML/Pug, SASS/CSS and Javascript.

projects.name: DBS Website Revamp
projects.desc: This is a website revamp for the DBS website. Responsible to move all contents from the old website to the new one, with responsive styles. On the same time, the website of Hong Kong need to follow the style guide of Singapore (parent company) but also have to be localized.

projects.name: Hava - Weather App
projects.desc: Side project. This app can view current local weather and powered by React.js and DarkSky API. Open it and view your local weather at a glance! You can also change temperature from °F to °C degrees using the switch on top right.
projects.techDesc: The main technologies are React, SASS/CSS.

contactText: Need a project? Feel free to contact me and let me know what you need. Everything would be tailor-made and suit your needs.
